headline: Stifel Raises Price Target on Baker Hughes (BKR) After Strong Q2 2025 Earnings
summary: Baker Hughes Company (NASDAQ:BKR) ranks among the best performing energy stocks to buy now. Stifel maintained its Buy rating on Baker Hughes Company (NASDAQ:BKR) while raising its price target to $50 from $49 after the company’s second-quarter 2025 performance. With adjusted earnings per share of $0.63, the company exceeded the $0.56 expectation. Additionally, Baker Hughes […]
